languages.text: {n}Тервантьяс начинает задумчиво стричь когтями-ножницами собственную плоть.{/n} "Иди на арену. Суккубы не проигнорируют возможность расправиться с тобой на глазах у зрителей. Если бы тебе удалось хотя бы ранить Кикеросс, это дало бы нам обоим время на побег. Для такого я готов пожертвовать наиболее смертоносными и ценными образцами из своей коллекции".

{n}Tervantias becomes so absorbed in his thoughts that he starts shearing off pieces of his own flesh with his scissor-like claws.{/n} "Enter the arena. The Succubi will not pass up this chance to gut you in front of an audience. If you could simply wound Keykeross, it would give us both enough time to escape. For that, I would be willing to sacrifice the deadliest and most valuable specimens in my collection."
languages.original_text: {n}Тервантьяс начинает задумчиво стричь когтями-ножницами собственную плоть.{/n} "Иди на арену. Суккубы не проигнорируют возможность расправиться с тобой на глазах у зрителей. Если бы тебе удалось хотя бы ранить Кикеросс, это дало бы нам обоим время на побег. Для такого я готов пожертвовать наиболее смертоносными и ценными образцами из своей коллекции".

The Succubi will not pass up this chance to gut you in front of an audience. If you could simply wound Keykeross, it would give us both enough time to escape. For that, I would be willing to sacrifice the deadliest and most valuable specimens in my collection."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

For that, I would be willing to sacrifice the deadliest and most valuable specimens in my collection."

The Succubi will not pass up this chance to gut you in front of an audience. If you could simply wound Keykeross, it would give us both enough time to escape. For that, I would be willing to sacrifice the deadliest and most valuable specimens in my collection."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Tervantias se plonge si profondément dans ses réflexions qu'il commence à s'arracher des morceaux de son propre corps à l'aide de ses membres affûtés.{/n} « Entrez dans l'arène. Les succubes se jetteront sur cette occasion de vous étriper en public. Si vous parveniez à blesser Keykeross, cela nous laisserait suffisamment de temps pour nous enfuir tous les deux. Je serais prêt à sacrifier le spécimen le plus létal et précieux de ma collection, si cela peut garantir la réussite de ce plan. »
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias becomes so absorbed in his thoughts that he starts shearing off pieces of his own flesh with his scissor-like claws.{/n} "Enter the arena. The Succubi will not pass up this chance to gut you in front of an audience. If you could simply wound Keykeross, it would give us both enough time to escape. For that, I would be willing to sacrifice the deadliest and most valuable specimens in my collection."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias se plonge si profondément dans ses réflexions qu'il commence à s'arracher des morceaux de son propre corps à l'aide de ses membres affûtés.{/n} « Entrez dans l'arène. Les succubes se jetteront sur cette occasion de vous étriper en public. Si vous parveniez à blesser Keykeross, cela nous laisserait suffisamment de temps pour nous enfuir tous les deux. Je serais prêt à sacrifier le spécimen le plus létal et précieux de ma collection, si cela peut garantir la réussite de ce plan. »
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}特万提亚斯完全沉浸在自己的思绪中，甚至没有注意到他剪刀般的利爪割掉了他自己的肉块。{/n}“你得去竞技场。那群血腥魔女绝不会放过这个机会，她们要在众目睽睽之下把你开膛破肚。如果你能弄伤绮克萝丝，就能为我们争取到足够的时间逃命。为了这个目的，我愿意将我的藏品中最致命、最珍贵的实验对象牺牲掉。”
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias becomes so absorbed in his thoughts that he starts shearing off pieces of his own flesh with his scissor-like claws.{/n} "Enter the arena. The Succubi will not pass up this chance to gut you in front of an audience. If you could simply wound Keykeross, it would give us both enough time to escape. For that, I would be willing to sacrifice the deadliest and most valuable specimens in my collection."

traits.locale_text: {n}特万提亚斯突然陷入了沉默之中。他完全沉浸在思绪中，甚至没有注意到他剪刀般的利爪割掉了他自己的肉块。{/n}“如果你能打伤绮克萝丝的话，就能为我们争取到足够的时间逃命。为了这个目的，我愿意将我的藏品中最致命、最珍贵的实验对象牺牲掉。”
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Tervantias versinkt so tief in seinen Gedanken, dass er beginnt, mit seinen scherenähnlichen Klauen Stücke seines eigenen Fleischs abzuschneiden.{/n} "Betretet die Arena. Die Sukkubi werden sich diese Chance nicht entgehen lassen, Euch vor Publikum zu zerfleischen. Könntet Ihr Keykeross auch nur verwunden, würde uns das genügend Zeit verschaffen, um zu fliehen. Dafür wäre ich bereit, das tödlichste und wertvollste Versuchsstück meiner Sammlung zu opfern."
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias becomes so absorbed in his thoughts that he starts shearing off pieces of his own flesh with his scissor-like claws.{/n} "Enter the arena. The Succubi will not pass up this chance to gut you in front of an audience. If you could simply wound Keykeross, it would give us both enough time to escape. For that, I would be willing to sacrifice the deadliest and most valuable specimens in my collection."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias verstummt plötzlich und versinkt so tief in seinen Gedanken, dass er beginnt, mit seinen scherenähnlichen Klauen Stücke seines eigenen Fleischs abzuschneiden.{/n} "Wenn Ihr Keykeross nur verwunden könntet, würde das uns beiden genügend Zeit verschaffen, um zu fliehen. Dafür wäre ich bereit, das tödlichste und wertvollste Versuchsstück meiner Sammlung zu opfern."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Tervantias queda tan absorto en sus pensamientos que empieza a cortar trozos de su propia piel con sus garras con forma de tijeras.{/n} «Entra en la arena. Las Súcubos no dejarán pasar la ocasión de eviscerarte delante del público. Si lograras herir a Keykeross, tendríamos tiempo suficiente para escapar. Estaría dispuesto a sacrificar al más letal y valioso de los especímenes de mi colección para semejante fin».
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias becomes so absorbed in his thoughts that he starts shearing off pieces of his own flesh with his scissor-like claws.{/n} "Enter the arena. The Succubi will not pass up this chance to gut you in front of an audience. If you could simply wound Keykeross, it would give us both enough time to escape. For that, I would be willing to sacrifice the deadliest and most valuable specimens in my collection."

traits.locale_text: {n}De repente, Tervantias se calla y se queda tan absorto en sus pensamientos que empieza a cortar trozos de su propia piel con sus garras con forma de tijeras.{/n} «Si lograras debilitar a Keykeross, tendríamos tiempo suficiente para escapar. Estaría dispuesto a sacrificar al más letal y valioso de los especímenes de mi colección».
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}テルヴァンティアスはじっと考え込み、それからハサミのような爪で自分の肉片を切り落とし始める。{/n}「アリーナに出場しろ。サキュバスは、観衆の眼前でお前のはらわたを抉り出すチャンスを逃しはしないだろう。キーケロスに傷を負わせることができれば、我々2人が逃げるのに十分な時間を稼げぐことができるだろう。そのためなら、私のコレクションの中で最も危険で貴重な標本を犠牲にすることになっても仕方あるまい」
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias becomes so absorbed in his thoughts that he starts shearing off pieces of his own flesh with his scissor-like claws.{/n} "Enter the arena. The Succubi will not pass up this chance to gut you in front of an audience. If you could simply wound Keykeross, it would give us both enough time to escape. For that, I would be willing to sacrifice the deadliest and most valuable specimens in my collection."

traits.locale_text: {n}テルヴァンティアスはじっと考え込み、それからハサミのような爪で自分の肉片を切り落とし始める。{/n}「アリーナに出場しろ。サキュバスは、観衆の眼前でお前のはらわたを抉り出すチャンスを逃しはしないだろう。キーケロスに傷を負わせることができれば、我々2人が逃げるのに十分な時間を稼げぐことができるだろう。そのためなら、私のコレクションの中で最も危険で貴重な標本を犠牲にすることになっても仕方あるまい」
traits.speaker: Haemonculae

languages.text: {n}Tervantias o kadar düşüncelere dalmış hâlde ki makasımsı pençeleriyle kendi etinden parçalar kırpıyor.{/n} "Arenaya gir. Sakkubuslar seni seyirci önünde delik deşik etme şansını kaçırmayacaktır. Keykeross'u yaralayabilirsen ikimize de kaçacak kadar zaman kazandırmış olursun. Bu uğurda koleksiyonumdaki en ölümcül ve en değerli numuneleri feda etmeye hazırım."
languages.original_text: {n}Tervantias becomes so absorbed in his thoughts that he starts shearing off pieces of his own flesh with his scissor-like claws.{/n} "Enter the arena. The Succubi will not pass up this chance to gut you in front of an audience. If you could simply wound Keykeross, it would give us both enough time to escape. For that, I would be willing to sacrifice the deadliest and most valuable specimens in my collection."

traits.locale_text: {n}Tervantias o kadar düşüncelere dalmış hâlde ki, makasımsı pençeleriyle kendi etinden parçalar kırpıyor.{/n} "Arenaya gir. Sakkubuslar seni seyirci önünde delik deşik etme şansını kaçırmayacaktır. Keykeross'u yaralayabilirsen ikimize de kaçacak kadar zaman kazandırmış olursun. Bu uğurda koleksiyonumdaki en ölümcül ve en değerli numuneleri feda etmeye hazırım."
traits.speaker: Haemonculae
